DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study test effectiveness French adaptation Blues program , school-based indicated depression prevention intervention . The program deliver endogenous psycho-social staff 3 Montreal secondary school adolescent sub-clinical depressive symptom compare no-intervention ( Informational Brochure ) control condition , design represent `` usual intervention '' school .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Trial French Blues Indicated Depression Prevention Program
DOC.criteria: Elevated depressive symptom ( score 20 Center Epidemiological Studies Depression screen questionnaire ) Current major depression diagnosis Current active suicidal behavior Being special school curriculum academic behavioral problem
